boardgame.description: Cockroach Poker is a reverse set collection game that has nothing to do with poker _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; except that the game is all about bluffing, but with cards that show cockroaches, rats and stink bugs instead of queens, 10s and aces. The goal of the game is to force another player to collect 4 of any one type of critter._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The deck includes 64 cards, with eight copies of eight types of critters. To set up the game, shuffle the deck and deal the cards out to players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On a turn, a player takes one card from his hand, lays it face down on the table, slides it to a player of his choice, and declares a type of critter, e.g., _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Stink bug_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. The player receiving the card either_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Accepts the card, says either _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;true_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;false_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, then reveals the card. If this player is wrong in her claim, she keeps the card on the table in front of her face up; if she is right, the player who gave her the card places it face up before him._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Peeks at the card, then passes it face down to another player, either saying the original type of critter or saying a new type. This new player again has the choice of accepting the card or passing it, unless the card has already been seen by all other players in which case the player must take the first option._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when a player has no cards to pass on his turn or when a player has four cards of the same critter on the table in front of him. In either case, this player loses and everyone else wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

I have the cheapest prices, so make sure to check out my other available items: http://bit.ly/1zkhMCa # General Information The item comes from a private collection (non-smoking). If you want pictures of the box or have any question in advance, just send me a geekmail or email to baxel@gmx.at , I will usually respond within two business days. Played twice. I use the austrian federal postal service (usually the cheapest option). Multilingual edition including English _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; German. Components are language independent. Box shows just a bit of wear. Inside everything there in nice condition.

Due to continuing storage problems, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m regularly selling (least-played) games from my personal collection. I did like all the games I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling , but with 200+ board and card games there are always other (comparable) contenders that just speak to me more. And besides, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m a real collector, always trying to perfect my collection with games I only like best (at that moment in time). The low pricing, therefore, is simple (if you were wondering): I just want to make other people happy for a few bucks/euros. Enabling me to purchase a new game every four or five orders. This game - Kakerlakenpoker (or Kakkerlakkenpoker) - has been played quite a few times, but the box only has a few scuff marks / shelf wear on the bottom (hence the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; condition) and all the cards and instruction booklet are still in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; condition, too. I do take good care of my games :) ... Only thing is that the back of the box has a dent on the right side, which makes it _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;acceptable_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; according to the official condition policy. Shipping from The Netherlands, Utrecht (PostNL or Kiala). So, before placing your order, please ask me for a shipping and packaging cost estimate first! The game is small, so there is a good chance this fits through the mailbox, keeping shipping costs low. Thank you for visiting and do check out the other games I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/gideongrim ...
